title: Credit trait
description: Trait that captures the need to attribute ownership or authorship to content.

credits.description: An array of people/groups attributed to this content.

credit.json.title: Credit for a piece of content.
credit.json.description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item.

org.description: The (optional) organization the contributor belongs to.

role.description: The role the contributor played in the content.
